summary: Provides an on‑line, lazy mapping of dataset sample indices that can dynamically upsample or downsample a collection while applying a two‑level pseudo‑random shuffle (block order and intra‑block order). The object behaves like a sequence, exposing length and element access without pre‑computing the full mapping.
business_intent: Enable scalable data loading pipelines to adjust sample rates and introduce stochastic ordering without the memory and time cost of pre‑computing a full index list.
